SVGAnimatedNumberListBaseVal.summary: The baseVal read-only property of the interface represents the base (non-animated) value of an animatable attribute that accepts a list of <number> values.

remarks.para: This property reflects the viewBox attribute of the <svg> element, the values attribute of the feColorMatrix element and the {{SVGAttr("points")}} attribute of the {{SVGElement("rect")}}, {{SVGElement("polygon")}}, or {{SVGElement("polyline")}} element as a readonly , providing access to a static list of points defined by the {{SVGAttr("points")}} attribute.

SVGAnimatedNumberListBaseVal.value: An object representing the base value of the attribute. The list contains one or more numbers corresponding to the individual number values specified in the attribute.
